summary: The story of two italian teams, playing in the third league, and a corrupted referee.
cast: Stefano Accorsi|Geppi Cucciari|Jacopo Cullin|Alessio Di Clemente|Marco Messeri|Francesco Pannofino|Grégoire Oestermann|Benito Urgu|Luigina Vacca|Franco Fais|Quirico Manunza|Marco Cadau|Andrés Gioeni|Gustavo De Filpo|Paolo Floris
title: L'arbitro
